Package net.innig.macker.structure

Interface Summary
ClassInfo Information about a class's structure.
 

Class Summary
AbstractClassInfo  
AccessModifier Java access modifiers for classes and members.
ClassManager The global collection of classes in Macker's rule-checking space.
HollowClassInfo Holds a class name, and lazily loads other attributes.
IncompleteClassInfo Class info for a class which Macker couldn't load.
ParsedClassInfo Class info retrieved from a class file.
PrimitiveTypeInfo Hard-coded class info for Java's primitive types.
Reference A reference from one class to another.
ReferenceType Taxonomy of different kinds of references between classes.
 

Exception Summary
ClassParseException A class file was found, but was unparsable.
IncompleteClassInfoException Macker needs attributes of a missing class.
